Label: The claim fee and any fixed costs claimed are payable in addition to the claim amount admitted.
The claim fee and any fixed costs claimed are payable in addition to the claim amount admitted.
The claim fee and any fixed costs claimed are payable in addition to the claim amount admitted.
The total amount, including any interest claimed to date, is £${totalClaimAmountPlusInterestAdmitPart}.

The amount to be considered is the claim amount and any interest claimed.  The claim fee and any 

fixed costs claimed are not included in this figure but are payable in addition and if judgment is 

entered on an admission will be included in the total judgment sum.
